para1: I am a technology professional drawn to the intersection of technology, business, and human experience.
para2: In this cross-functional domain, there are unique opportunities and challenges emerging every day.  I am passionate about leveraging digital technology in effective and responsible ways to drive value in products, services, and solutions.
para3: Simply put, I believe in building things that are useful.
para4: You may also find me playing guitar, enjoying the great outdoors, or watching the beautiful game.
